title.value: Внутрипородный молочный тип скота белорусской черно-пестрой породы
Intrapedigree dairy type of cattle of the Belarus black-motley breed
Intrapedigree dairy type of cattle of the Belarus black-motley breed

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Tanana, L.A., Grodno State Agrarian Univ. (Belarus)
Dashkevich, M.A., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breeding (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus as a result of long-term work the inbreed dairy type of cattle was obtained in the amount of 1000 cows with a yield of 9,097 kg of milk with 4,12% of fat and 3,26% of protein. Cows of inbreed type are characterized by high dairy productivity. The average milk yield of 526 cows of new type at RUAE 'Plemzavod 'Krasnaya zvezda' makes 9395 kg of milk with 4,18 % of fat and 3,20% of protein, at GUSP 'Plemzavod 'Mukhavets' - 474 animals - 8766 kg - 4,01% - 3,33%, respectively. Genealogical structure of the new type is composed of six genealogical complexes: 1 - Aerostar-Costar Lee, 2 - Starbuk-Klyaytus, Lidman, 3 – Bella Mayak, Rocky, 4 - Valerian-Blekstar; 5 - A.Roteyt-Ch. Mark; 6 - P. Governer, San of Bova, Tony. In all the complexes there are the branches, each of which reveales' the bulls-improvers
